name: Blitzcrank
title: the Great Steam Golem
shortBio: Blitzcrank is an enormous, near-indestructible automaton from Zaun, originally built to dispose of hazardous waste. However, he found this primary purpose too restricting, and modified his own form to better serve the fragile people of the Sump. Blitzcrank selflessly uses his strength and durability to protect others, extending a helpful metal fist or burst of energy to subdue any troublemakers.

skins.name: Goalkeeper Blitzcrank
skins.description: One of the all time greatest keepers for Chaos FC, Blitzcrank has finally taken their place in the Sports Hall of Fame. Their image rests proudly with the likes of Volleyball Dragon, Women's Tennis Scuttle Crab, and Badminton Baron Nashor.

skins.name: Boom Boom Blitzcrank
skins.description: Their fists are named “boom” and “boom,” proving that robots are a perfect facsimile of human life.

skins.name: Piltover Customs Blitzcrank
skins.description: Your robot's legs were busted, so we replaced them with a vintage '32 hot rod, and eight-cylinder external mounted coal engine. Plus we painted flames on his fists. The flames cost extra.

skins.name: iBlitzcrank
skins.description: Built as household assistance automata, thousands of iBlitzcranks were corrupted by Program during a routine software update. With their human owners oblivious to this fact, they continue to help, waiting patiently for the time their new command lines are initiated.

skins.name: Riot Blitzcrank
skins.description: A Riot Games skin obtained by either meeting a Rioter or attending an official Riot event in 2013.

skins.name: Battle Boss Blitzcrank
skins.description: A boss hailing from a popular science fiction shooter, Blitzcrank is well known in the gaming community for cheap mechanics, powerful attacks, and a massive health pool. Veigar fittingly made them the gatekeeper of his personal fortress, because Veigar hates fun.

skins.name: Lancer Rogue Blitzcrank
skins.description: An ancient sentinel corrupted by mysterious black lightning, Rogue Lancer Blitzcrank mercilessly crushes provincial armies, destroying entire castles with kings still on their thrones. What caused its rampage is still uncertain, but for now it seems to be following its dread protocol to the letter.

skins.name: Lancer Paragon Blitzcrank
skins.description: A silent protector of the masses, the artificial paladin Blitzcrank was aroused from the earth by a bolt of mysterious white lighting. It now serves all honorable subjects, defending with true and calculated precision.

skins.name: Witch's Brew Blitzcrank

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2019.

skins.description: Once nothing but a simple cauldron, Blitzcrank was enchanted, brought to life in order to assist Miss Fortune in her beguiling bewitchments.

skins.name: Space Groove Blitz & Crank

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2021 Space Groove event.

skins.description: Blitz and Crank are Cat Planet's fiercest warriors, and work together seamlessly (mostly) to pilot their mech, Blitzcrank. While Crank believes that he can overcome his lack of rhythm with the help of his exuberant copilot, Blitz is… well… he's busy dancing to his own beat. Together they plan to take over Dog Planet and claim its sunbeams for themselves.

skins.name: Victorious Blitzcrank

descriptions.description: This Chroma was awarded to players who reached Platinum rank in Solo/Duo ranked queue
This Chroma was awarded to players who reached Diamond rank in Solo/Duo ranked queue
This Chroma was awarded to players who reached Master rank in Solo/Duo ranked queue
This Chroma was awarded to players who reached Grandmaster rank in Solo/Duo ranked queue
This Chroma was awarded to players who reached Challenger rank in Solo/Duo ranked queue
This Chroma was awarded to players who reached Platinum rank in Flex ranked queue
This Chroma was awarded to players who reached Diamond rank in Flex ranked queue
This Chroma was awarded to players who reached Master rank in Flex ranked queue
This Chroma was awarded to players who reached Grandmaster rank in Flex ranked queue
This Chroma was awarded to players who reached Challenger rank in Flex ranked queue

skins.description: Victorious Blitzcrank was awarded to players who reached Gold or higher in the 2021 season.

skins.name: Zenith Games Blitzcrank

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

skins.description: Originally a bomb defusal robot, Blitzcrank was made a referee because of their ability to make split-second adjustments to stay ahead of the prodigious athletes. Only later did everyone realize that the bot's background made them unusually effective in defusing the intense... disagreements that often arise.

skins.name: Beezcrank

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.

skins.description: Beezcrank has a reputation for getting his bee-infantry into sticky situations. Probably because of that giant honey-comb mech-arm.

passive.name: Mana Barrier
passive.description: Blitzcrank gains a shield based on their mana when dropping to low health.

spells.name: Rocket Grab
spells.description: Blitzcrank fires their right hand to grab an opponent on its path, dealing damage and dragging it back to them.
spells.dynamicDescription: Blitzcrank fires their right hand, <status>Pulling</status> the first enemy hit towards them and dealing <magicDamage>@TotalDamage@ magic damage</magicDamage>.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Overdrive
spells.description: Blitzcrank super charges themself to get dramatically increased Move and Attack Speed. They are temporarily slowed after the effect ends.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Blitzcrank supercharges themself, gaining @MoveSpeedMod*100@% decaying Move Speed and @AttackSpeedMod*100@% Attack Speed for @Duration@ seconds.

Afterwards, Blitzcrank is Slowed by @MoveSpeedModReduction*100@% for @SlowDuration@ seconds.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Power Fist
spells.description: Blitzcrank charges up their fist to make the next attack deal double damage and pop their target up in the air.
spells.dynamicDescription: Blitzcrank charges up their fist, causing their next Attack to <status>Knock Up</status> for @CCDuration@ second(s) and deal <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ physical damage</physicalDamage>.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Static Field
spells.description: Enemies attacked by Blitzcrank are marked and take lightning damage after 1 second. Additionally, Blitzcrank can activate this ability to remove nearby enemies' shields, damage them, and silence them briefly.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Passive: While this ability is available, lightning charges Blitzcrank's fists, marking those Attacked. After 1 second, they are shocked for @PassiveDamage@ magic damage.

Active: Blitzcrank overcharges, dealing @ActiveDamage@ magic damage and Silencing nearby enemies for @SilenceDuration@ seconds. Their shields are also destroyed.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@
